headline.main: PUTS NAZI FORCES AT 10,000,000 MEN; PREDICTS SPREAD OF WAR McCloy Tells Michigan Bar Our Entire Army Is No Larger Than Germany's Air Strength

lead_paragraph: JACKSON, Mich., Sept. 19 (AP) -- John J. McCloy, Assistant Secretary of War, said here today that the Germans have 300 divisions totaling nine to ten million men under arms and that perhaps 100 of these are yet to be thrown into the battle of Russia.
abstract: Asst Sec J J McCloy compares current and potential strength with that of Germany and Brit

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: PERSONNEL, MILITARY, ASSIGNMENTS AND FORCE MOVEMENTS
